statements: SELECT * FROM geographical_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, data_value FROM geographical_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geographical_data WHERE data_value < 100;
SELECT location_name FROM geographical_data WHERE longitude < -100 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, data_value FROM geographical_data WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM geographical_data WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY data_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, data_value FROM geographical_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM geographical_data WHERE data_value BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM geographical_data WHERE longitude IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM geographical_data;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM map_layers WHERE feature_type = 'point';
SELECT layer_name, layer_description FROM map_layers WHERE layer_id < 5;
SELECT layer_name, layer_description FROM map_layers WHERE layer_id = (SELECT MAX(layer_id) FROM map_layers);
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY location_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM map_layers WHERE feature_type = 'point' AND layer_description ILIKE '%important%' ORDER BY layer_name
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE longitude < -75 ORDER BY location_name, latitude
SELECT layer_name, layer_description FROM map_layers WHERE layer_id < 100 ORDER BY layer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE location_name ILIKE 'New%' ORDER BY latitude, longitude DESC
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, region_name FROM regions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM geo_data WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT location_id, region_id, population FROM geo_data WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT region_name, center_latitude, center_longitude FROM regions WHERE center_latitude > 40;
SELECT locations.name, regions.region_name, geo_data.population FROM locations JOIN geo_data ON locations.id = geo_data.location_id JOIN regions ON regions.id = geo_data.region_id;

SELECT locations.name AS location_name, regions.region_name AS region_name, geo_data.population AS population FROM locations JOIN geo_data ON locations.id = geo_data.location_id JOIN regions ON regions.id = geo_data.region_id WHERE regions.region_name LIKE 'North%';
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 30;
SELECT boundary_name, ST_AsText(boundary_geometry) as geometry FROM boundary_data;
SELECT region_name, region_description FROM region_data WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type FROM spatial_analysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude >= 40 AND longitude <= -100;
SELECT * FROM region_data WHERE region_name LIKE 'North%';
SELECT region_name, region_description FROM region_data ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT boundary_name, ST_AsText(boundary_geometry) FROM boundary_data;
SELECT city_name, latitude, longitude FROM cities;
SELECT country_name, population FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT location_name, city_id, country_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, population FROM regions WHERE country_id = 1;
SELECT country_name, continent FROM countries WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND longitude BETWEEN -180 AND 180;
SELECT country_name, population FROM countries WHERE continent = 'Europe' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_name, longitude, latitude FROM cities WHERE city_name LIKE 'N%' ORDER BY city_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, population FROM regions WHERE country_id IN (SELECT country_id FROM countries WHERE continent = 'Asia');
